sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: REGISTERS in chemiſtry, are holes, or chinks with ſtopplea, contrived in the fides of furnaces, to regulate the fire ; that is, to make the heat more intenſc or remifs, by opening them to let in the air, .or keeping them cloſe to exclude it. There are alſo regiſters in the ſteam-engine. See SτκAM-Enfine.
